and gp.ancestor = g1.id and g1.status = 0
and gp.descendant = g.id and g.status = 0 and g.id = ug.grp_id and ug.type = 0 and ug.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.id = gr.role_id and r.domain_id = d.id and r.status = 0 ) ) )
